review.comment:
First and last. Place a Togo went to go pick up. No curve side. Valet / security sends me all the around the side to go pick to my food. Would not let me thru cause private party. I walk but not sure where front door is , turn around n left.
Hey goode don’t take to go orders  if your  priority is the private party !
review.review_reply: Hi AY, that is not what we like to hear at all. Our manager would like to speak with you directly to learn more about your experience. Would you mind filling out this form so they can reach out to you https://tinyurl.com/4hn658vb?

review.comment: Good food. Love the deer chili.
review.review_reply: Hi Chris, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the fare here at the Armadillo Palace. We hope to see you again soon and please know we are working hard to find a way to bring back venison chili.

review.comment: Wow, great food, awesome service, and cold beer.
review.review_reply: Hi Jesse, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful visit to the Armadillo Palace. We hope to see you again soon, maybe for one of our live shows.

review.comment: It was awesome, my son and I with two friends had lunch there, the atmosphere was perfect, the host, Geanue, was new but all her suggestions were taken by us and they were spot on, she made our visit so much better. The food was great.
review.review_reply: Hi Johnny, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your lunch at the Armadillo Palace. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment: Five foodies walked into a bar/restaurant.....and enjoyed some amazing grub and service by Ray.  We like to try each others stuff and all of it rated 5 stars.  The grand old fashion chicken tenders were crisp on the outside and tender on the inside.  The taquitos dorados were very tasty.  The bacon cheddar grits were delectable. A glass of sauvignon wine was enjoyed, a frozen margarita was consumed with gusto by me and my wife, our son enjoyed an old fashioned, one lemonade was sipped.  The yardbird was a hit.  Fried okra was everybody's fave.  Grilled chicken skewers were very good.  A couple orders of fried pork skins and cantina queso were annihilated.  Four butter biscuits were fought over.  One to go piece of peach cobbler was hauled away, along with a few leftovers....and I do mean a few.......
review.review_reply: Hello and thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed food and service. We hope to see you again soon, next time you will have to try the our spit roasted chicken.

review.comment: Nice setup!
review.review_reply: Hi Frank, glad to hear you enjoyed the Armadillo Palace. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

review.comment: Awesomeness. Company event. Everyone was nice and the food was awesome.
review.review_reply: Hi Terrence, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Armadillo Palace. We hope to see you again soon!

review.comment:
Ordered thru DoorDash, chicken tenders with fries and everything came in one box,all mixed up, ketchup packets inside the box with my food like???  They don’t even know how to bag an order.
Food 3/5

review.comment: Fantastic food, service and atmosphere. Perfect for the Texan experience.

review.comment: Great venue. Outside and I indoor seating, bars and band stage. Outdoor space is large enough for different seating and social/dancing.
review.review_reply: Hi Maggie, thank you for sharing your feedback! We hope to see you again at one of upcoming live events. Please visit https://thearmadillopalace.com/live-music/ for a complete schedule.

Hi Vaughn, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to the Armadillo Palace and we hope to see you again soon.

review.comment:
I haven’t even finished my meal and had to stop to write this review! This is some of the best food I’ve had so far in Texas! I’m new and have literally been searching for southern comfort food and biscuits! Y’all don’t believe in biscuits down here?! Lol

I ordered greens, rice and bean, and biscuits. Best decision I’ve made this week. I’m super picky about greens, but these are really good. The rice and beans has a good ratio, not Soupy. And these freaking biscuits! I would like to thank Heaven.. and the cook!

I did to-go. Food was waiting for me (I was late and it was still nice and warm when I got home).  Man at the bar was nice enough. In and out in less than 3 mins.

This area, Upper has great food, but a lot of it is expensive and “fancy.” Which is fine. But sometimes you just want simple food done well and not to spend $40 on a single meal.

$18 and I have 2-3 meals! The two sides are 16oz and then 4 biscuits.

I’m gonna finish eating now, but this place is definitely worth a visit!
review.review_reply: Hi Hope, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our biscuits and smoked chicken collard greens. We hope to see you again soon, next time you will have to try the hand breaded chicken tenders, ps its comes with a biscuit.
Hi Christina, we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to Armadillo Palace. We hope to see you again soon.
Hi Joshua, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your visit to The Armadillo Palace. We hope to see you again soon.

review.comment:
Excellent Food, service was great. Hailey and Lisa were so helpful. No wait. Food came out in great time. We'll worth the time and money.
We were looking for a bar with music and they asked everyone that worked there and we had a plethora of options.
Highly recommend!!
review.review_reply: Hi Julie, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the fare and our service. We hope to see you again soon at our next show!

review.comment: The food was was great and live music and dancing was a fun filled night.
review.review_reply: Hi Bert, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the fare and live music. We hope to see you again soon.

review.comment: Had the chicken which was good. The collard greens were great.

I haven’t eat at the Goode  company for at least 15 years. I’m working in the medical center wanted Barbecue, order from DoorDash and I was very displeased the meat is very bland the sauce gives you the idea that you’re eating spaghetti sauce that texture no spice. Like what happened??  I remember this being spicy good flavor and this is not so sorry won’t go back
Boom 💥 💥 💥  fire 🔥 ♥ 👌
Great place to see a show. Great place to eat. Great crew.
review.review_reply: Hi Sherri, thank you for sharing your feedback! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our Texas inspired cuisine and the show. We hope to see you again soon.

review.comment: I know Goode Bird is gone but can y'all PLEASE at least put that fried chicken on the Armadillo menu?? That chicken was no joke - the best in Houston!

The valet staff at this place is incompetent. First they told me that the valet parking was 'complimentary' and then after leaving they decide to charge me a fee.  I had no issue with this until the valet staff was being continuously rude. Overall, the place is nice but the food is subpar.
Great place for an event - lots of space, good food, friendly staff and great atmosphere.
The salad was delicious. They offer a wide variety of delicious recipes and delicious food. Enjoyed our meal.
Not the same place as pre covid. Miss the original menu.

Went to a concert the weekend after Thanksgiving, parked my car on Goode Co property with Luxe Valet for the event, when it was over I learned that my car had been hit while another car was getting parked….. forward a week later and I have learned that the valet that’s contracted with Goode Co (Luxe Valet) basically doesn’t have insurance coverage in the sense that they only have a claim against them if the persons’ car they parked doesn’t pay called secondary insurance, called Goode Co to let them know of this with no call returned……. Now sitting without a car and or claim opened and no one seems to care about something that happened on their watch and on their property. I rarely leave reviews but I figured everyone should know about the parking situation before they are in the same spot I’m in.  Even though the concert was good, we will probably won’t be returning to this venue or any of its affiliate restaurants.

Used to love this place.  But not a fan as much since the changes.  It's confusing when they are even open.  Not a music since anymore.
Food was good and waiter was as well. The bus boy was a bit creepy and kept asking for our plates when we were not even finished eating.
Love the live music, fun place for dancing
This Dish was Absolutely AMAZING Just wow. Crystal at the bar was so helpful and pleasant. Can't wait to try more!!
